description:
Add bucket name as node or fetch buckets with another preset. You can see yout buckets in the web browser as well: https://s3.console.aws.amazon.com

Be aware oif region settings. You get an error if the wrong region is set.

Register at Amazon AWS to obtain access key and secret. Reference: https://docs.aws.amazon.com/de_de/AmazonS3/latest/API/Welcome.html
name: Get bucket content
